GET /api.description: Serves up a JSON representation of all the available endpoints of the API

GET /api/products.description: Returns an array of all products available in the store

POST /api/products.description: Creates a new product and returns the created product object

GET /api/products/:product_id.description: Returns a single product by its ID

PATCH /api/products/:product_id.description: Updates a product by its ID and returns the updated product object

DELETE /api/products/:product_id.description: Deletes a product by its ID and returns a message confirming the deletion

GET /api/orders.description: Returns an array of all orders made in the store

POST /api/orders.description: Creates a new order and returns the created order object

GET /api/orders/:order_id.description: Returns a single order by its ID

PATCH /api/orders/:order_id.description: Updates an order by its ID and returns the updated order object

DELETE /api/orders/:order_id.description: Deletes an order by its ID and returns a message confirming the deletion

GET /api/order_items.description: Returns an array of all order items across all orders

POST /api/order_items.description: Creates a new order item and returns the created order item object

GET /api/order_items/:order_item_id.description: Returns a single order item by its ID

PATCH /api/order_items/:order_item_id.description: Updates an order item by its ID and returns the updated order item object

DELETE /api/order_items/:order_item_id.description: Deletes an order item by its ID and returns a message confirming the deletion
